resources.string:
Is this the real life?
 Is this just fantasy?
 [Blank] in a landslide,
 No escape from reality.


[Blank] your eyes,
 Look up to the [Blank] and see,
 Im just a poor boy, I need no [Blank],
 [Blank] Im easy come, easy go,
 Little high, little low,
 Any way the wind blows doesnt really matter to me, to me.


Mama, just killed a man,
 Put a gun against his head,
 Pulled my trigger, now hes dead.

Help Page
 Here are the rules of the game
 Aim: To pick up words on a map in order to guess the name of they song they belong to.
 You can choose the difficulty on the homepage, each one makes the game harder. But no worries! You can use points to help you in the game. 
 You can also see your completed songs and link to their youtube video in the completed songs page
